dietaryRestrictions.title: Dietary Restrictions
dietaryRestrictions.description: Head to Settings to add your dietary needs like gluten-free or vegan. Our AI will automatically filter recipes to match your requirements.

mealPlanner.title: Meal Planner
mealPlanner.description: Create weekly meal plans with AI-generated recipes. Set the number of meals, servings, and let our AI do the rest.

familyCalendar.title: Family Calendar
familyCalendar.description: Plan meals for the whole family on specific dates. Perfect for coordinating weekly dinners or special occasions.

specialMeals.title: Special Meals
specialMeals.description: Create unique recipes for holidays, parties, or themed dinners. Get custom AI suggestions based on your event.

favorites.title: Favorite Recipes
favorites.description: Save recipes you love for quick access later. Build your personal cookbook with your best discoveries.

loadRecipes.title: Import Recipes
loadRecipes.description: Paste a recipe link in any language and we'll save it in your selected language.

unitConverter.title: Unit Converter
unitConverter.description: Tap any ingredient to convert between cups, grams, tablespoons, and more. No more guessing measurements.
